description:
Usami Hajime is a veteran employee at the Yuzawaya store dealing in goods dedicated for handicrafting.
He gave valuable advice to http://anidb.net/ch120645 [Gojou Wakana] who at the time was trying to solve a problem with bunny girl outfit prepared for http://anidb.net/ch120646 [Kitagawa Marin].
name: Usami Hajime
